bow: moms of reddit when do you work out what exercise do you do treadmill before they wake up what time do you hop on the treadmill my husband works afternoons so go in the mornings run days week and lift days usually try to do running lifting on the same days if his schedule changes my gym has daycare so ll take my daughter if have to making the time to focus on my fitness for an hour or every couple days has absolutely helped my physical and mental health 5:00 but my kids are school age when they were babies did it after their early am feed ride my bicycle to and from work every single day and take work during my breaks and lunch also chase my gremlin children when they re up to mischief xd yoga after kids are in bed as soon as get up and wake my girls and 10 we all do few songs of marshall fitness on youtube awesome way to start the day then we walk my oldest half mile to school full mile for me on return and the same to pick her up in the afternoon that what do but not really workout guess every day off work run 5k as soon as my kids wake up from nap give them their afternoon snack and load them into the jogging stroller and away we go before got pregnant again took him to the child care at the gym in the mornings from about year old 20 months and worked out for about 45 min other than that jogging stroller with him or evening after my husband got home and kiddo was near bedtime would head to apartment gym or jog if it was dark keep trying to get up early to run but my toddler has sixth sense about me trying to sneak out and it hard enough to get up early most successful running after work live about miles from work few days week take the bus to work and run home if want shorter run ll take the bus halfway home have to transfer buses anyway at halfway it 45 minute bus ride with the transfer and actually get home little faster than that if run only the second half it the most efficient way for me to fit in run if ca fit in run my backup is youtube workout videos like blogilates lol they re fun and can get in an after dinner workout while the kids play tell them no dessert until finish my workout so they have incentive to not interrupt me go for run or to the gym on my lunch break for me it treadmill after my class and before pick the kiddo up from school walk to the fridge and squats to look for food then walk back to the couch run wether before work which means lm running at 445 am or the treadmill after kids are in bed sometimes can get lunch time run in but it not guaranteedeb and hesitant to count on it because at the tail end of marathon training hot yoga at local studio after the kiddo has gone to bed helps me sleep better sneak away for walks whenever can sometimes after work in the evenings sometimes between errands on the weekends sometimes mid day if do have work if diligent can get in walks week but normally like my son is either in school or at home with papa used to go at 4:30am now go during lunch because joined gym near my office 8pm for 30 minute training session twice week too lazy to do it alone and more efficient and effective with trainer deleted do pure barre on my lunch break it stupid expensive and do love it it the only gym close to my office that has class on my lunch break too busy when get home and already up at in the morning with my month old my daughter is only two but ve been hiking with her since she was six months old just carry her with me wherever go lost all my baby weight and down 30 pounds from where was before started hiking still going strong even though pregnant with our second am sahm so go several times week wherever sounds like fun make cleaning exercises it little less than 10 feet from the sink to the dishwasher so lunge there and back when stacking and unstacking it do squats as fold laundry put weights on the broom and between rooms squat with it on my shoulders and vacuuming and mopping work my arms out quite bit because of the push and pull also do crunches and leg lifts with my daughter she thinks it great game she also taught me to stand without using my hands and that itself is the biggest exercise of my day insanity during nap time did you feel decrease on energy after getting pregnant worked out pretty solidly before was pregnant with my second but still barely have the energy to do my daily chores 18 weeks pregnant love to have the energy to go hiking also do you baby wear her while hiking my wife leaves for work early and tiptoes out of the house have 2year old and month old that both wake up around 8am get everyone in the car around 9am and go to the local ymca drop the kids off at their complimentary included in their family membership package day care and then do 30 min elliptical or treadmill and then either leg weights or arms depending on the day pick up kids and head home for lunch and nap time bam own fencing club and fence for about an hour four or five times week coaching the other classes and hauling gear is sometimes enough to satisfy my fitbit and sometimes not try to go to hot yoga two mornings week but the last few weeks we ve been sleeping in the hot yoga place is near her daycare so drop her off little early sahm to 5yo son and 3yo daughter try to get them out for walk every afternoon mornings are for errands and lunch time is my sons nap time in the afternoon might push my son in one of those push tricycles while my daughter rides her bike but this is great workout this week have been luring my daughter on long walks in the double stroller by telling her we will find halloween decorations if she onboard with the idea so is my son if am desperate might pace around the house after bedtime or during my sons naptime walked with my baby in carrier for months then graduated to jogging stroller caved and got gym membership that came with childcare when the weather got too hot over the summer also hey everybody come to fitmama sahm so workout at home using weights set of and 12 lb dumbbells and sandbag that weighs 20 lbs use this website zuzkalight com zgym pay 99 each month and workout with her she has new exercise routines each week and throw in old routines in the mix as well so do get bored there are lots of variety hiit bodyweight and strength training all can be modified to your fitness level she has some free minute workouts to try out if you do know if you like her style or routines on her youtube channel love her workouts it is fun and do get bored of it removed cool thanks for linking excited to find this sub yaaay also bike commute from home to daycare to work and back again it really helped me lose the baby weight feel great and miss my bike on the odd day that have to drive into work high five to us wear 28lb toddler on my back while pushing another roughly same size toddler in stroller for 20 each way to go to drop in public preschool uphill both ways removed am sahm with one kiddo in school and toddler after the big kid goes to school get little one breakfast and then let her watch tv show after that she usually has some energy and let her free play while turn on either youtube work out of tae bo seriously it fun and gets you sweaty or some yoga also do blogilates pilates work outs and her pilates intense interval training program it tough but it only 28 minutes and have seen huge results after work out hop in the shower while little one plays in the bathroom or takes shower with me reading this at 1am while riding my exercise bike run if less than miles with the stroller longer runs am up at 3am to run alone before anyone wakes up monday is ballet tuesday is boot camp thursday is running biking friday is body circuit omnia and saturday is deep water swimming the ymca gives two hours of daycare so workout for an hour then shower and if lo has slept by then we go home and he takes nap go to boot camp in the local park on wednesday evenings and saturday mornings do always make it but the exercise keeps me sane do this too wake up between 3:30 4:00 and drink my coffee and water before jumping on around 5:00 this lets me get 45 minute run stretch any weights want to do and shower before have to wake the kids up for school at 6:30 am morning person so this works really well for me to counter the early morning am usually in bed by 9:00 deleted sahm to 21 month old and month old and go on lot of walks put the toddler in stroller and my infant in soft structured carrier and often ll even bring the dog haha she very well behaved the walks are good for sanity in my opinion the baby likes being rocked to sleep by the rocking and my son likes to talk about the things we re passing no one is making mess usually everyone is happy getting exercise and do have to worry about changing my routine when pregnant started this when got pregnant with my oldest my goal is to go 10 000 steps day and usually my walks are around 000 000 per walk try and find the biggest hills around for extra exercise sometimes it nice because it bonding with my kids and do have to plan around getting anyone to watch them just around naps and weather between that and dieting was the lowest weight ve been in since college before got pregnant again 15 lbs lower than pre pregnancy sometimes ll see other moms out and about walking with their babies and can meet other moms while on my walks ve met ton of new neighbors usually with them starting the conversation by saying have full load with all of my little ones roller derby practice and play when the kids are in bed same it the best exercise and seeing friends at the same time it really is and there are so many derby moms out there yay for tae bo do it three times week while the little one naps in the morning mix in jillian michael 30 day shred and yoga videos the other weekdays that her sister is in preschool it so fun my mom managed to save my vhs tapes from high school it like the late 90 at my house billy blanks and sweat together and the kids even get in on it sometimes yes have huge decrease in energy and what capable of these days at 18 weeks summitted mount saint helens sans toddler and that was the best ve felt 20 weeks now and all the joint and ligament stuff us kicking in even though my energy has come back bit have to adjust the hikes that do and stick with stuff that normally not challenge do babywear my toddler use ssc carrier for short park hikes but anything over miles have to switch to the deuter frame pack to save my shoulders have dvds from college that ve been moving with for years billy slouch socks always make me smile the dream of the 90s is alive in my living room ca wait for my girls to be big enough to join in thank you for the reply we just moved to colorado months ago and now that we have mountains galore so bummed to not have the energy to hike them glad to know it possible to hike with tot was scared to try that bit full time working mom with 15 month old joined roller derby the structured practice times force me out of the house because pay fee to be there feel more motivated to get there on my husband lunch break or after he gets out of work ll pick workout from the first month of insanity max 30 because the workout cooldown is 35 minutes work out about times week but kind of stopped and now having hard time getting back into it go to www hikeitbaby com and see if there branch near you hike on my own ton but also run the seattle branch of hike it baby and we have lot of fun with it lots of other families with toddlers and we are all in the same boat as far as having to go slower sometimes packing extra snacks stopping to feed kids and diaper changes it wonderful community and all volunteer run we ve met some great friends by being involved in the group this is amazing thank you there happens to be an event in my area tomorrow do stroller walks count thought was the only one yes yes yes tae bo during nap time thanks for the pointers walk everywhere about 2hrs day it bit harder in the cooler months use the babysitting room for the kids and depending on the day go to different classes step aerobics yoga cardio pump and zuma ve lost 45lbs so far
